PHRASE.LANG: Trono dei reali in ametista imperiale (LMO)
Trono amatista imperial de la realeza (LMO)

Now you can be a royal! Live the fantasy in your own majestic throne from the Giftinator 9000 from Hellfire Games. Includes two custom sitting animations and activates a custom run animation when the avatar is moving at its full running speed. The speed boost is engaged when the avatar is moving at its full running speed. [#Legal]

Vous pouvez désormais faire partie de la royauté ! Vivez un rêve éveillé dans votre propre trône majestueux du Giftinator 9000 d'Hellfire Games. Inclut deux animations assises personnalisées. Le boost de vitesse est activé quand l'avatar se déplace à sa vitesse maximale. [#Legal]

Jetzt kannst du auch königlich sein! Lebe deinen Traum in deinem eigenen Königsthron aus dem Geschenkomat 9000 von Hellfire Games. Enthält zwei spezielle Sitz-Animationen. Der Geschwindigkeitsschub setzt automatisch ein, wenn der Avatar sich mit voller Geschwindigkeit bewegt. [#Legal]

Ora puoi essere un vero reale! Vivi il sogno seduto direttamente sul tuo maestoso trono di Giftinator 9000, Hellfire. Include due animazioni personalizzate che si siedono. Potrai dare una spinta di accelerazione quando l'avatar avrà raggiunto la massima velocità. [#Legal]

¡Ahora puedes ser de la realeza! Vive la fantasía en tu propio trono majestuoso del Giftinator 9000 de Hellfire Games. Incluye dos animaciones de movimiento personalizados. El turbo se activa cuando el avatar se mueve a su velocidad de carrera completa. [#Legal]

Now you can be a royal! Live the fantasy in your own majestic throne from the Giftinator 9000 from Hellfire Games. Includes two custom sitting animations and activates a custom run animation when the avatar is moving at its full running speed. The speed boost is engaged when the avatar is moving at its full running speed. [#Legal]

Now you can be a royal! Live the fantasy in your own majestic throne from the Giftinator 9000 from Hellfire Games. Includes two custom sitting animations and activates a custom run animation when the avatar is moving at its full running speed.
